recipe.name: Coq Au Vin
recipe.preparation: BOUQUET GARNI:  thyme, bay leaf and parsley in cloth cheese bag or teaball.Wash chicken and pat dry.  Mix flour, salt and pepper; coat chicken with flour mixture.  In large skillet, fry bacon until crisp; drain and set aside.  Brown chicken in hot bacon drippings.  Push chicken aside; add onions and mushrooms and cook and stir until onions are tender.  Drain off fat.Crumble bacon; stir in with remaining ingredients.  Cover; simmer about 1 hour or until chicken is tender.  Remove Bouquet Garni before serving.  Skim off excess fat.  If desired, sprinkle with snipped parsley.
recipe.notes: **UNTRIED** My mother loved making this dish when she was entertainig.  Its got a good amount of prep work ahead  of it, but once its going it can be pretty well left alone.From the Betty Crocker Recipe Card Library--Entertaining on a shoestring
